entry.title: Transference
entry.summary:
Author: murphy_stoffelis

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 84,103Chapters: 18/18Kudos: 245

Summary: A violent blight is sweeping through Gotham. Innocent people are suddenly being consumed by rage with disastrous consequences. With no cure in sight, Jason finds himself working with Batman to save the city from madness. Even with his resurrection a thing of the past, an alliance with the Bats is a harrowing line between reconnecting with a former life and preserving the Red Hood's hard-won autonomy— especially when Jason's partnership with Dick Grayson begins to rekindle a past they've both tried to bury. Because in a city like Gotham, you can't trust who you love. Not even family.

entry.summary:
Author: fagcreature

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,944Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 264

Summary: Dick smiled at him, and whispered: “We’ll figure it out together, yeah?”Jason froze, heart beginning to hammer in his chest. Jason wasn’t entirely sure what they would be doing, but he knew it would involve taking his pants off, and surely that’s not something brothers were supposed to do together, right? That just... doesn’t sound right. But Jason’s never had a brother before. How should he know? Jason also didn’t know how touching himself worked, and Dick apparently didn’t know either, so maybe this was just how they would bond as brothers. Learn something new together and grow closer in the process.Jason squeaked out a little “okay”, but Dick hadn’t waited for it, already shuffling closer to him on the bed before Jason could make a sound. - Dick convinces Jason to let him touch his pussy, for the purpose of learning about his anatomy together, of course.
